com.magnet.core

Class ManagedServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.core.ManagedServices

  • public class ManagedServices
extends Object
    Alternative to starting NanoServices (i.e., engine) in managed mode.

    This scheme relies upon reference counting. When reference count goes to zero the engine is stopped.

    On a per JVM basis, the engine is either in managed mode or unmanaged mode. Unmanaged mode relies upon the caller to start and stop the services core manually.
